column4: good morning. I am trying to install ubuntu on my emachines G725 but I can see nothing because the brightness is at 1%... anyone got an idea?
0_o turn the brightness up on your monitor dude!
are you using the monitor right now?
is the monitor ever displaying at full brightness?
are you hooking this monitor to your laptop for a screen ?
does the screen on the laptop work?
which screen is dimming at boot? laptop screen ?
i only have a laptop here there is no other screen or monitor =)
are you trying a GUI install? which ubuntu ?
11.10 . I installed ubuntu already by setting off... acpi=off
